description.422: Chrome legs support the base and sofa of the click mechanism profile collection. Offered in brown bi-cast vinyl with contemporary line stitching.

description.427: The Somerset Sleeper in the Paragon collection has a Radius Arm, Top stitching and a small leg.
description.429: Utilizing a fully sprung seat cushion using no-sag construction, the sleeper sits just like a high quality non-sofabed. With the finest high resiliency foam, it sleeps just like the best memory foam beds on the market today.
description.432: A multifunctional and Modular design intended for your living room.
description.434: The perfect sofa for overnight guests. This stylish sofa easily converts from sofa to bed in 2 easy clicks. Solid construction in tufted high quality faux leather and stylish chrome legs for a contemporary flair A third hidden back leg is available under a Velcro patch, which easily opens for extra support when this becomes a bed. Perfect for a guest room, basement or dorm room.
description.437: The Cordova leather full sleeper sofa will add grandeur to your home. The deep, overstuffed cushions are inviting while the nailhead details add sophistication. Your overnight guests will relax in comfort on the full size pull-out bed. The Cordova collection includes a reclining sofa, loveseat, recliner and ottoman.
description.439: Patterns Queen sleeper. With its restrained lines and gentle curved arms, the Patterns collection offers a timeless, classic look with a refined contemporary feel. With include box seat cushions, welt details, rolled arms, loose back pillows plush rolled arm.
description.440: The SM2 Sofa will provide you with a comfortable seat in a solid, yet elegant design.
description.447: The Santa Fe sofa bed is upholstered in black tufted eco-leather for a sleek and contemporary look. The frame is made with carbon steel for durability while the seat and back are made with density foam to provide the most comfort and support possible. The sofa bed is accentuated by curved steel legs to create a sophisticated and polished appearance. Fold down the back to make a comfortable bed for your guests.
description.450: Clean lines and exceptional comfort characterize the Divina Sofa. Divina appears to float in mid-air, with razor-thin legs supporting the chrome-plated steel frame. It features an elegant European style, ideal for both residential and office applications. Sustainability Statement: Sustainable design is a key component of environmental focus. Commitment to social responsibility and a healthy environment has prompted the company to further articulate its longstanding environmental programs and, with encouragement and support from colleagues in the industry, the manufacturer has re-energized its focus on such ''green'' initiatives as life cycle analysis and LEED certification. Proud to have contributed to projects that have received LEED certification from the U.S. Green Building Council. The Divina Sofa is Greenguard certified. Order with Confidence: Each authentic product includes a certificate of authenticity. Design Year: 2001. Compliance with Cal 133 specifications. Warranty: Products are guaranteed to be free from defects in materials and workmanship during the applicable warranty period set forth in the warranty.
description.451: The Briza Sofa Bed features a fold down backrest and folding armrests to make the transition from sofa to bed easier. Upholsteredwith a tufted backrest, the Briza will fit well with any interior. Triangular legs complement the contemporary styled sofa.
description.452: Convertible sofa has an adjustable back that has three different positions. The back will adjust to sit like a regular sofa, can also be lowered halfway for added comfort, and can also lay flat making it a bed. Additionally, the sofa features a drop down snack tray that is fitted with cup holders.
description.453: The functional Mineral Sofa folds into a bed for overnight guests to use. It is upholstered in deep brown fabric to match any interior and is accented with stainless steel legs on each corner of the sofa bed. Constructed with a wooden frame, the Mineral Sofa Bed is built to last.
description.454: Constructed with a high ratio welded tube frame and carbon steel legs, the Sierra sofa bed has a sturdy and durable foundation. The body of the sofa bed is upholstered in high quality 100% polyester grey fabric with small tufts along the seat and back creating a soft and subtle texture. Lay the back of the Sierra down to transform it into a bed to arrange a comfortable night’s stay for your friends.
description.455: The amply sized and comfortable Pfister settee is perfect for living rooms, waiting rooms, and offices. The versatile Pfister can accommodate a wide range of interior needs.
description.457: Stylish contemporary appeal and practical design make the Devena convertible sofa a great addition to any living space. This piece features generously padded foam seats for utmost comfort, expertly upholstered in rich leatherette with tufted accents. A center console folds down to reveal cup holders and convenient storage. Easily converts into futon bed to offer extra bedding space as needed.
description.461: The SM1 Settee will provide you with a comfortable seat in a solid, yet elegant design.
description.462: The functional Mineral Sofa Bed fold into a bed for overnight guests to use. It is upholstered in deep fabric to match any interior and is accented with legs on each corner of the sofa bed. The Mineral Sofa Bed is built to last.
description.463: This contemporary sofa bed easily folds down to accompany any of your overnight guests. Upholstered in white leatherette and filled with a polyurethane foam cushion, the Coolidge offers optimal comfort. The white leatherette is accented by the steel frame with metal mesh and chrome legs.
description.464: Modern style and versatile design highlight this adjustable fabric loveseat and sofa bed. This multi-functional sofa bed allows you to maximize available space and make the most out of your home.
description.465: Completely unique, the Zipline Modular Sofa & Ottomans features a versatile "flip" feature that enhances any room. With its 3-tiered multi-functional design, this couch creates the perfect layout for your space with the ability to customize it quickly and easily. Relax with friends in the comfortable three-person sofa with ottomans, or stack the ottomans inside for a large gaming table or seating pad. Even better, fold it out completely and rest on the comfy California king-size lounging platform. You can even stack one ottoman inside for a built in armrest or workstation while seated. The removable Cone Denim covers feature stylish YKK brass zippers and are machine-washable. Available in two colors, the Zipline will complement your decor beautifully.Care Instructions for covers: machine wash with cold water and tumble dry on low heat.
description.466: The Handy Living Convert-A-Couch Sleeper Sofa is an ideal seating option to use in rooms with smaller floor areas. Perfectly blending style and efficacy, this sofa is appropriate to keep in your living room or guest room. It is a 2-in-1 sofa-cum-bed, which is practical to use in homes which are running out of space, or dorm rooms and hostels. The Convert-A-Couch Sleeper Sofa from Handy Living is made from premium-quality foam filling, which has a thick density of 1.8 cubic feet. It is upholstered in polyester blend of high-quality for unmatched durability. This sofa is available in a range of solid upholstery colors, which can be chosen in accordance with the color scheme or decor of your room. It has an independently-wrapped pocket coil spring system, which makes the sofa comfortable while sitting for a long time. This sofa has pillow-top arms, and completely opens to turn into a full-sized bed. It has a Handy Lock™ feature, which makes the assembly a hassle-free process. This sofa stands on four wooden legs, which have a dark espresso finish. It can easily seat three people and has a weight capacity of 600 pounds.The sofa is CARB compliant to ensure that the indoor air quality of your home is maintained. Easy to maintain, it can be spot cleaned with cold water and mild soap.
description.467: Handy Lock no tool feature makes assembly a breeze. Just click and slide together. Contemporary designed sofa sleeper has a storage area and cup holder built into each arm. Converts into a full size bed with the touch of a hand. Espresso finished wood legs. Covered in soft velvet, 100% polyester. Includes two throw pillows. Sofa sleeper is a versatile piece of furniture that has a three position click style hinge which allows you to sit, recline or sleep 2 comfortably. Pillow top seat cushion for extra comfort. 576 Independently wrapped pocket coil spring system. No bar in the back for added sleeping comfort. Cushion accommodates full size sheets for sleeping. Steel seat and back frame with metal to metal connections for strength and durability. Innovative engineering and packaging design enable the item to be assembled in the actual room. Eco-friendly and efficient product design uses less fossil fuel based components in construction and delivery. Break it back down to recycle at the end of use for additional peace of mind.
description.468: This piece features stylishly shaped set-back arms along with the supportive seat and back cushion beautifully adorned with welt detailing to create an inviting contemporary styled piece that offers a refreshing look and the comfort perfect to enhance any living area.
description.469: Enjoy total comfort and luxury with style by getting home the LifeStyle Solutions Serta Dream Convertible Sofa in Beige. This convertible sofa has a wooden frame, which ensures years of reliable use. It has foam-filled upholstery and tufted cushions, which makes it extremely comfortable and plush. The convertible sofa is accentuated with an alluring beige color and features a tufted style that adds to its aesthetic appeal. This Serta Dream Convertible Sofa in Beige from LifeStyle Solutions is suitable for residential as well as commercial use. It has the capacity to hold weight up to 200 pounds. The convertible sofa is a part of the Serta Dream Convertibles collection.
description.470: Comfort and convenient is all include on this futon bed, surprise your surprised guest with this futon. It can be converted from futon bed to sofa in second.
description.472: The Bella Vista sofa bed is the best choice for homes with tight space that need a place to sit, a place to store, and an extra bed. This sofa bed, has storage compartments underneath in addition to an easy bed conversion mechanism.
description.474: Cozy up on the plush microfiber fabric that blankets the Winchester sofa convertible sofa bed. This sleek and modern design is the perfect addition to any loft or compact living space. Go from watching your favorite TV show to catching a quick cat nap in seconds.
description.475: Make your home fulfill your perfect design solution by providing it with the Westbrook collection. The focal point being the precise curve of the arms with pleated details along with crisp, welt embodying the entire piece.
description.476: The Abbyson Living Cosmo Sleeper Settee provides with comfort, style, and total relaxation. This sleeper sofa is upholstered in microfiber and has cushions with foam filling. It features chrome legs that are made using stainless steel. The sleeper sofa features a stylish black color that looks elegant and blends well with variety of home decors. For added style and comfort, this sleeper sofa features a tufted back. It has an adjustable back that ensures a better seating angle. This Cosmo Sleeper Settee from Abbyson Living is suitable for residential as well as commercial use. It is ISTA 3A certified, which ensures optimum safety for the product during transit.
description.477: With the soft upholstery fabric beautifully surrounding the shaped arms and supportive seating and back cushions, the relaxing cottage design of this piece uses country styled fabric and welt detailing running throughout to create the warmth and comfort of a cottage getaway within your home.
description.478: The Anatolia Sofa bed is the best choice for homes with tight space that need a place to sit, a place to store, and an extra bed. This sofa bed, has storage compartments underneath in addition to an easy futon bed conversion mechanisim.
description.479: The Almira Sofabed is contemporary design influenced with classic themes to bring complete functionality to your home.  From the storage compartment underneath, to the convertible bed, comfort, quality, and functionality is what you can expect.
